Pages: Use the pointers and click the trigger button when the laser turns red to interact with the virtual environment.
Use the teleportation platforms to move around the kitchen.
Use the screens to read and listen to the recipe texts.
Use the tablet in the kitchen to access the pause menu and then the options, the help page and to exit the level.
To start cooking, take the ingredients from the pantry.
Check the ingredients to be collected and those collected using the screen in the larder.
Once you have gathered all the ingredients, you can prepare the recipe in the kitchen.
In the kitchen on the left are all the ingredients collected.
The central part contains all the tools.
When you have finished the recipe, go to the judges to check your knowledge.
